name: Potion Panic (anotherthingnamedcolbert)
description:
Collect all the potion ingredients needed for your master before time runs out! 

Travel to the four different areas (Basement, Hot storage, Tower, and Secure Storage) and get to the bookshelf at the end holding what you need while avoiding the traps in each room.

Controls:
WASD: Move
Spacebar: Jump
E: collect the ingredient on the shelf (when nearby)
Escape: Pause

Note: This is an early release. There are most likely some bugs present which will be fixed in the next few days.
